title: EDA and models. Score 0.74291
description: This is a fun Halloween competition. We have some characteristics of monsters and the goal is to predict the type of monsters: ghouls, goblins or ghosts. At first I do data exploration to get some insights. Then I try various models for prediction.
description_lemmatized: fun halloween competition characteristic monster goal predict type monster ghoul goblin ghost first data exploration get insight try various model prediction
